pr_title: [BEAM-9179] Move value conversion logic out of ExpressionConverter

timeline.message: Move value conversion logic out of ExpressionConverter
Move value conversion logic out of ExpressionConverter
Move value conversion logic out of ExpressionConverter
Move value conversion logic out of ExpressionConverter
Move value conversion logic out of ExpressionConverter

timeline.bodyText: I believe a single column with an empty name is allowed. ZetaSQL allows multiple columns without names.
timeline.author: apilloud

replies.bodyText: Yeah this comment is not accurate. The real problem is Beam does not allow multiple columns with the same name (empty in this case). Thanks for spotting this.
replies.author: robinyqiu

timeline.bodyText:
This LOC specified the return STRUCT type explicitly, so Calcite does not need to infer. Adding this line introduced a bug, because later when the schema is translated to Beam Schema, duplicate field names will be caught. #12550 fixes this bug.
@apilloud
timeline.author: robinyqiu
